title: British politicians address global leaders in metaverse on Web3 and blockchain vision
description: In a landmark virtual gathering on September 20th, a group of British politicians and Lords took to the metaverse to share their vision for the United Kingdom’s blockchain and Web3 industries. The event, attended by global leaders from 51 nations, highlighted both the potential and challenges presented by the rapid growth of Web3 technology. Political ... Read more
